\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{plotting x-y plot}
\subsection*{plotting x-y plot}

\begin{lstlisting}
subplot(1,2,1);
p1 = polyfit(x,y,3);
y1 = polyval(p1,x);
plot(x,y,'.k',x,y1,'r')
title('Linear-Linear');
grid on;
xlabel('X');
ylabel('Y');
hold on;
\end{lstlisting}
\begin{lstlisting}[language={},xleftmargin=5pt,frame=none]

plot(x,y,'.k',x,y1,'r')
title('Linear-Linear');
grid on;
xlabel('X');
ylabel('Y');
hold on;

\end{lstlisting}


\phantomsection
\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{plotting x-log(y) plot}
\subsection*{plotting x-log(y) plot}

\begin{lstlisting}
f = log(y);
subplot(1,2,2);
p2 = polyfit(x,f,1);
y2 = polyval(p2,x);
plot(x,f,'.k',x,y2,'r')
title('Log-Linear');
xlabel('X');
ylabel('Y');
grid on;

legend('y1','y2');
\end{lstlisting}
\begin{lstlisting}[language={},xleftmargin=5pt,frame=none]
